casebody.data:
Kerr, Respondent, v. Hammer, Appellant. (Supreme Court, General Term, Third Department. September 25, 1891.) Action by Alexander H. Kerr, as commissioner of highways of the town of Edwards, against Mary Hammer.

Argued before Learned, P. J., and Landon and Mayham, JJ.

Ho opinion. Motion for reargument denied. Eor opinion on appeal, see 15 N. Y. Supp. 605.
